ingredients.ingredient: 1 (16 ounce) can jackfruit in brine, drained

cookingTips: Jackfruit has stringy texture similar to pulled pork when shredded; handle gently
Drain canned jackfruit thoroughly to remove excess brine
Toast buns in butter before serving for better texture and flavor
